name: HKQueryOptions
desc: Constants that describe how a sample’s time period overlaps with the target time period.

items.name: static var strictStartDate: HKQueryOptions
items.desc: The sample’s start time must fall within the target time period.

items.name: static var strictEndDate: HKQueryOptions
items.desc: The sample’s end time must fall within the target time period.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized query option using the provided integer.
